underlying_goal: To clean up a documentation file and make it a highly visible priority in the project's instructions.
primary_success: Claude correctly interpreted the user's increasingly urgent requests, culminating in the creation of a prominent banner at the top of the project's main instruction file to highlight a deadline.
brief_summary: The user asked Claude to clean up a paper review spec and reference it in the project's main `CLAUDE.md` file. Through a series of iterative requests, the user then had Claude progressively increase the visibility of this reference, culminating in Claude adding a prominent banner at the top of the file to flag it as a critical, time-sensitive priority.
